item.title: RYSE UP musician connection/collaboration app
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Hey, “no problem”.

Downloaded it, will take a proper look and might give it a try.
It’s definitely more in line with my plans to take things more seriously this year.

Read full topic

item.title: RYSE UP musician connection/collaboration app
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Yeah I saw this featured previously on US App Store, looks like not a terrible idea. Seems kind of like an Allihoopa but perhaps more geared toward “serious” “career” production rather than just a music social community (like this)

Not doing the quotes to be a just not really sure how else I’d tag it. Doesn’t seem like a bad idea

Read full topic
